answers.answer: There really is nothing else you can do! I am almost 32 weeks and have gained over 30 lbs with this pregnancy. Now that we are nearing the end it's really baby gainig all of the weight. My doc says baby should be gaining about a pound a week.

Hah..its just the opposite thing for me!! Since my 26th week i have not gained a pound. And that really really makes me sad. I am trying to maintain a good diet amd reduced my carbs intake totally due to borderline diabetes. As long as baby is doing good, i guess we dont need to stress out much. How i wish i could gain a little more wieght like u mommas.. 32 weeks today and have only gained 15 lbs so far. :(
I'm 33 weeks and I've gained 30 lbs I still don't believe it! !
I'm 33 weeks and gained 50 lbs! I don't really think you have anything to be worried about. We gain the most weight in the last trimester. If your doctor isn't concerned you shouldn't be either.
32 weeks with twins and gained 24 pounds.
If your doctor thinks it's ok, let that put your mind at ease. I've gained 17 pounds at 32 weeks but have kept up with lots of cardio and did hot yoga several times a week until a month ago.
I'm 32 weeks and gained 30lbs. As long as you and baby are healthy I don't think you should worry. There will be plenty of time to burn off the weight later.

I am 32 weeks and have only gained a total of 6.5lbs. but my baby girl is 4lbs and growing doctor isn't worried and if your doctor isn't either than your fine. The weight gain can simply be fluids or your baby growing and neither is a bad thing. Don't stress about it enjoy and if your truly worried look for healthy recipes so if you are gaining a lot of weight still at least you know your doing what you need to.
I'm almost 32 weeks and I gained 30 pounds with this pregnancy.  I gained 60 pounds with my first pregnancy and lost them all after . Don't  worry about  it .

question: I'm 35 weeks had a Dr check up today and gained almost 7lb... I'm getting so frustrated.. I try watching what I eat I drink tons of water and I do walking.. what else is there to do?
title: Still gaining..
